price: 54 Ils doutent pourtant de la rencontre de leur Seigneur, alors que Sa science embrasse toute chose et que Son pouvoir est sans limite.
arabic: أَلَآ إِنَّهُمۡ فِي مِرۡيَةٖ مِّن لِّقَآءِ رَبِّهِمۡۗ أَلَآ إِنَّهُۥ بِكُلِّ شَيۡءٖ مُّحِيطُۢ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: alā innahum fī mir'yatin min liqāi rabbihim alā innahu bikulli shayin muḥīṭun
